M001RegisterInstructionModal.instruction: Please follow the following steps to request a system user account and submit the staff.
M001RegisterInstructionModal.line1Link: Request form for access to the service system, borrowing funds for occupation
M001RegisterInstructionModal.line2: 2. Fill out the form and sign the head of the agency.
M001RegisterInstructionModal.line3: 3. Prepare a copy of the ID card with a certified copy.
M001RegisterInstructionModal.line4: 4. Send documents to the elderly fund at the following address.
M001RegisterInstructionModal.line4Address1: Elderly Fund Department of Elderly Affairs (MP)
M001RegisterInstructionModal.line4Address2: 255 Pitchayonayothin Building, inside Rajavithi Home for Girls
M001RegisterInstructionModal.line4Address3: Ratchawithi Road, Thung Phaya Thai, Ratchathewi, Bangkok 10400
M001RegisterInstructionModal.line5: 5. Once approved for use, the system will send the link for the first time access * to the email specified on the registration form. And to allow you to verify your identity and specify the password to access the next time
M001RegisterInstructionModal.noteDescription: *This link will only be used for first time access. And will not be able to use again If registering successfully

M002DeactivateUserInstruction.header: Regulations request for canceling user accounts
M002DeactivateUserInstruction.instruction: Please follow the steps below to request a cancellation of a user service system, borrowing funds for a career.
M002DeactivateUserInstruction.line1Link: Request Form for Cancellation of User Code for Borrowing Funds for Career
M002DeactivateUserInstruction.line2: 2. Fill out the form and ready to specify the name you wish to cancel.
M002DeactivateUserInstruction.line3: 3. Please specify the name of the applicant. Ready to confirm the list by signing the supervisor of the agency
M002DeactivateUserInstruction.line4: 4. Send documents to the elderly fund at the following address.
M002DeactivateUserInstruction.line4Address1: Elderly Fund Department of Elderly Affairs (MP)
M002DeactivateUserInstruction.line4Address2: 255 Pitchayonayothin Building, inside Rajavithi Home for Girls
M002DeactivateUserInstruction.line4Address3: Ratchawithi Road, Thung Phaya Thai, Ratchathewi, Bangkok 10400
M002DeactivateUserInstruction.line5: 5. When the staff has canceled the list of users already Will notify the applicant email in the registration form to confirm the cancellation of the account completely.
